member.name: T:Mediator.MediatorOptions
member.summary: Provide options for the Mediator source generator.

member.name: P:Mediator.MediatorOptions.Namespace
member.summary: The namespace in which the Mediator implementation is generated. By default, the namespace is "Mediator".

member.name: P:Mediator.MediatorOptions.GenerateTypesAsInternal
member.summary: Wether or not generated types should be internal (they are public by default).

member.name: P:Mediator.MediatorOptions.NotificationPublisherType
member.summary: The type to use when publishing notifications. By default, the type is .

member.name: P:Mediator.MediatorOptions.ServiceLifetime
member.summary: The default lifetime of the services registered in the DI container by the Mediator source generator. By default, the lifetime is .

member.name: P:Mediator.MediatorOptions.Assemblies
member.summary: The collection of assemblies to scan for Mediator handlers. By default, the collection is empty, in which case the source generator will scan all assemblies through references from the source generated project.

member.name: P:Mediator.MediatorOptions.PipelineBehaviors
member.summary: The collection of types of pipeline behaviors to register in DI. When the type is an unconstructed generic type, the source generator will register all the constructed types of the generic type (open generics that is supported during AoT).

member.name: P:Mediator.MediatorOptions.StreamPipelineBehaviors
member.summary: The collection of types of streaming pipeline behaviors to register in DI. When the type is an unconstructed generic type, the source generator will register all the constructed types of the generic type (open generics that is supported during AoT).

member.name: T:Mediator.MediatorOptionsAttribute
member.summary: Provide options for the Mediator source generator.

member.name: P:Mediator.MediatorOptionsAttribute.Namespace
member.summary: The namespace in which the Mediator implementation is generated. By default, the namespace is "Mediator".

member.name: P:Mediator.MediatorOptionsAttribute.NotificationPublisherType
member.summary: The type to use when publishing notifications. By default, the type is .

member.name: P:Mediator.MediatorOptionsAttribute.ServiceLifetime
member.summary: The default lifetime of the services registered in the DI container by the Mediator source generator. By default, the lifetime is .

member.name: T:Mediator.AssemblyReference
member.summary: Represents an assembly reference. This is used to specify the types or assemblies to scan for Mediator handlers.

member.name: P:Mediator.AssemblyReference.Assembly
member.summary: The assembly reference.

member.name: M:Mediator.AssemblyReference.op_Implicit(System.Type)~Mediator.AssemblyReference
member.summary: Creates a new instance of from the specified type.

member.name: M:Mediator.AssemblyReference.op_Implicit(System.Reflection.Assembly)~Mediator.AssemblyReference
member.summary: Creates a new instance of from the specified assembly.

member.name: T:Mediator.Mediator
member.summary: Generated code for Mediator implementation. This type is also registered as a DI service. Can be used directly for high performance scenarios.

member.name: F:Mediator.Mediator.ServiceLifetime
member.summary: The lifetime of Mediator-related service registrations in DI container.

member.name: F:Mediator.Mediator.NotificationPublisherName
member.summary: The name of the notification publisher service that was configured.

member.name: F:Mediator.Mediator.TotalMessages
member.summary: The total number of Mediator messages that were discovered.

member.name: M:Mediator.Mediator.#ctor(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Constructor for DI, should not be used by consumer.
